general_advisory: Prepare the wet nursery seed beds for paddy. Using rainwater the nursery beds may puddle 2-3 times followed by planking. Apply 200 kg of FYM, 4 kg of DAP, 2.5 kg of MOP and 1 kg of Zinc sulphate during the last puddling. Divide nursery area into smaller plots of convenient length.

advisory: Seed treatment - Treat the paddy seeds with Carbendazim 50% W.P @ 1.5 g/1kg of seeds or Carboxin 37.5% + Thiram 37.5% @ 3 g/1 kg of seeds before sowing in the nursery.
For maintaining the heat in the poultry shed during winter season, install heaters in the shed.
Yellow mosaic virus - To control, go for spraying of triazophos @ 400 ml/acre or Acetamipride @ 40 g per acre.

Wilting: In view of high humidity, wilting may occur at this stage. Spray Mancozeb 75% WP @ 2g/ltr of water if symptom is noticed.
Fruit & Shoot borer: Install pheromone trap @ 8nos/acre to monitor pest population.
To manage Alternaria leaf spot disease in Cole crops, spray Mancozeb 75% WP @ 600g/acre by mixing in 200 litres of water.
Aphids and Jassids infestation may be seen in the field. To manage it, spray Imidachloprid 17.8% SL @ 1 ml/lt.
Leaf eating caterpillar - To manage, use Pheromone trap Spodolure @ 6/acre or Install light trap @ 5 nos. Apply Bacillus thuringiensis @ 500 g/acre or Beauveria bassiana @ 1kg/acre.
